Statement.Sql: select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort,g.mGroup,g.mFieldId as mFId from FIELD_GROUP g left join FIELD_VALUE v on g.mFieldId=v.mFieldId and v.mTable=? and v.mKey=? and v.mPos=0 and v.mId IN (select max(mId) from FIELD_VALUE group by mKey,mFieldId) left join FIELD f on g.mFieldId=f.mId where g.mGroup=?

select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort,g.mGroup,g.mFieldId as mFId from FIELD_GROUP g left join FIELD_VALUE v on g.mFieldId=v.mFieldId and v.mTable=? and v.mKey=? and v.mId IN (select max(mId) from FIELD_VALUE group by mKey,mFieldId,mPos) left join FIELD f on g.mFieldId=f.mId where g.mGroup=?
